content.paragraph: Applicants would be the primary stakeholders for any CHAOSS Badging review. They will be responsible for:

list: Applying for an Event/Project related badge.
Making improvements according to reviewer feedback.
Possibly be the single point of contact between their own community, other participants and CHAOSS.

content.paragraph: Things applicants will be able to do:

list: Submit details required for a Badging review.
Edit details and make improvements in their application.

content.paragraph: Things applicants will not be able to do:
